name: UpdateWorkloadProtectionPolicy
description:
Update a specific Workload Protection policy in Datadog.

This tool updates a specified Workload Protection policy using the Datadog API. It should be called when modifications to security policies are needed. Note that the endpoint is not available for the Government (US1-FED) site.

parameters.name: agent_policy_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Agent policy to update.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Agent policy

parameters.name: resource_type
parameters.description: The type of the resource, always set to 'policy'.

value_schema.description: The type of the resource, must always be `policy`

parameters.name: policy_description
parameters.description: A string that provides the description of the Workload Protection policy. This should explain the policy's purpose or key features.

parameters.name: host_tags_for_policy_deployment
parameters.description: An array of strings representing the host tags defining where this policy is deployed.

value_schema.description: The host tags defining where this policy is deployed

parameters.name: host_tags_conditions
parameters.description: Array of host tags specifying policy deployment conditions. Inner values use AND logic, outer values use OR logic.

value_schema.description: The host tags defining where this policy is deployed, the inner values are linked with AND, the outer values are linked with OR

parameters.name: policy_name
parameters.description: The name of the Workload Protection policy to be updated.

parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Agent policy to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Agent policy

parameters.name: policy_enabled
parameters.description: Indicates if the policy is enabled. Use true for enabled, false for disabled.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Agent policy

value_schema.description: The ID of the Agent policy

parameters.name: data.attributes.hostTags
parameters.description: The host tags defining where this policy is deployed

value_schema.description: The host tags defining where this policy is deployed

parameters.name: data.attributes.hostTagsLists
parameters.description: The host tags defining where this policy is deployed, the inner values are linked with AND, the outer values are linked with OR

value_schema.description: The host tags defining where this policy is deployed, the inner values are linked with AND, the outer values are linked with OR

parameters.name: data.id
parameters.description: The ID of the Agent policy

value_schema.description: The ID of the Agent policy

parameters.name: data.type
parameters.description: The type of the resource, must always be `policy`

value_schema.description: The type of the resource, must always be `policy`
